video.title: Bruno and the Banana Bunch
video.synopsis: Bruno loves to learn new things about the world around him and has a fascination with numbers, shapes, sizes and all things math-related!

episodes.synopsis: Bruno is putting on a spectacular circus show, and he's invited all of his friends to perform!
episodes.title: Big Top Bruno

episodes.synopsis: When Bruno discovers that all of his bananas have disappeared, he sets out to get to the bottom of this perplexing mystery.
episodes.title: Detective Bruno

episodes.synopsis: It's show-and-tell day in Bananaland, but Bruno has forgotten to bring something special!
episodes.title: Bruno's Special Stick

episodes.synopsis: Bruno has decided to paint a picture for his wall. He visits his friends for inspiration and literally jumps into their paintings!
episodes.title: Bruno's Painting

episodes.synopsis: Bruno puts some chairs together to make a train and picks up his friends at the station.
episodes.title: Bruno's Railroad

episodes.synopsis: When Bruno finds a treasure map, he puts on his eye patch and scarf and sets sail for adventure along with his swashbuckling mateys!
episodes.title: Bruno's Pirate Adventure

episodes.synopsis: When Bruno invites his friend Purple Penguin to sleep over, he soon realizes that they are very different.
episodes.title: Bruno's Houseguest

episodes.synopsis: Bruno's tree house is a mess, but instead of tidying up, he builds a robot out of brooms, buckets and cleaning supplies.
episodes.title: Bruno's Messy Robot

episodes.synopsis: Bruno promises to watch Pink Cow's racing turtles while she's out, but the trouble starts when they accidentally get away!
episodes.title: Bruno & the Racing Turtles

episodes.synopsis: Everybody is very disappointed when a rainstorm ruins Bruno's backyard campout, so Bruno comes up with a new plan -- they'll camp in!
episodes.title: Camp Bruno

episodes.synopsis: Bruno wants to go on a holiday, but where will he go? He enlists the help of the Banana Bunch to help him decide.
episodes.title: Bruno's Happy Holiday

episodes.synopsis: Bruno loses his ball in a tree and discovers a silly goose nest, but when one of the eggs hatches, the little silly goose thinks Bruno is his mother!
episodes.title: Bruno & the Silly Goose

episodes.synopsis: Bruno is having fun playing hide-and-seek, but when it's his turn to find his friends, he can't find anyone!
episodes.title: Bruno Plays Hide & Seek

episodes.synopsis: Inspired by a comic book, Bruno becomes a superhero and spends the day performing feats of heroism all over Bananaland.
episodes.title: SuperBruno

episodes.synopsis: When Bruno's picnic basket floats off into the sky with some helium balloons attached, Bruno and his friends make their own balloon and give chase.
episodes.title: Bruno's Balloon

episodes.synopsis: Bruno invents a time machine and goes back to the time of the dinosaurs.
episodes.title: Bruno's Time Machine

episodes.synopsis: Bruno is excited to put on a magic show for the Banana Bunch, but he mixes up his magic words and makes his friends disappear!
episodes.title: Bruno the Great

episodes.synopsis: Bruno really wants to buy a kite at Green Frog's garage sale, but he doesn't have enough money.
episodes.title: Bruno's Piggybank

episodes.synopsis: It's time for the annual Bananaland Games, and the competition is fierce! Bruno really wants to win first prize this year.
episodes.title: Bruno's Bananaland Games

episodes.synopsis: Bruno and his friends are playing a round of Bananaland Golf, but the game is cut short when the ball falls into the water.
episodes.title: MiniPutt Bruno

episodes.synopsis: Bruno is invited to a costume party but can't decide what to wear!
episodes.title: Bruno & the Mystery Guest

episodes.synopsis: When Bruno loses a piece of his favorite puzzle, he decides to retrace his steps to find it.
episodes.title: Bruno's Backwards Day

episodes.synopsis: Oh no! Bruno has forgotten all about Big Elephant's birthday party, and now he doesn't have a present to bring!
episodes.title: Bruno & the Birthday Bash

episodes.synopsis: It's the day of Pink Cow's dance recital, and Bruno is in charge of the music. When the music player doesn't work, Bruno comes up with a new plan.
episodes.title: Bruno's Band

episodes.synopsis: After losing to his friends in a game of basketball, Bruno falls asleep wishing he were much taller.
episodes.title: Bruno's Big Day

episodes.synopsis: Bruno blasts off into space in search of new friends. He travels to the Pink Planet, where he meets a Space Cow, but she's very shy.
episodes.title: Bruno's Rocket
